website_summaries.verdict: Smart design that allows for airflow to keep the player cool. Offered at a desirable price.
pros: Made to fit players of multiple ages, giving helmet nice versatility
Will meet all NOCSAE standards for batting helmets
Has a sleek look that younger players will love
Uses EVA dual density foam for maximum comfort and moisture wicking
cons: Can be tough to find the right face mask for the pre-drilled holes

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for average kids ages 5-7!
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as a t-ball helmet. My kids are average size kids ages 6 & 7 in a coach pitch division. This hat fit great. Other kids would ask to borrow it because it didn't slide around on their heads when they were at bat.
customer_reviews.author: MDMom09

customer_reviews.title: Must HAVE for baseball/softball
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fit my 4 yr old great & saved her from a hard hit! she was running into home and another kid slung the ball right at her head - it hit the helmet HARD & bounced back about 6ft. My daughter was oblivious to it all and kind of turned like Hey who touched my helmet?" she thankfully didn't feel a thing! I almost didnt purchase it because we played tball this year and I told myself why does she need a helmet when they are hitting off of tees? I am SOO glad that I bought it anyways! Get your child a helmet! It is well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: southernshopper

customer_reviews.title: Good Brand, Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I did not like watching my granddaughter use one of the "team" (shared) helmets - what better invitation for lice?! This one is perfect. Rawlings is just a dependable brand and they make dependable products. It is sturdy, she can still hear while wearing it (as much as any child can anyway!), it is comfortably padded and it should still be fine for t-ball or softball next year. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Holmes

customer_reviews.title: The proper protection early in the game!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for for my 3 year old grandson. At 3, it appears like it's too big and heavy, but very quickly he was comfortable with it and able to bat (t-ball) and field (as well as a 3 year old can field) like he'd been wearing it for a long time. It will be the batting helmet that will get him well into little league before we have to size-up. It's Rawlings so the quality is there. It might seem a tad pricey, but if you're protecting a $2 brain, you buy a $2 helmet.....
customer_reviews.author: m.knapp

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought one each for 7 yr old boy just starting baseball and for 10 yr old girl playing softball. They are a perfect fit and very comfortable. I had to go back and order the face guards later because I didn't know they were a requirement this year. The helmet is a great price. The face guard prices seem a little high, but I needed to find the proper fit for what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbijean Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: fits my large 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: He's a big kid for his age. This helmet fits him well, and would probably fit well on most kids under about age 10 or 12. Red is good since most helmet in the dugout are black. This makes it more recognizable as HIS. We can also write his name on it, unlike a black helmet. Seems like it should provide good protection for the physics involved in little league baseball.
customer_reviews.author: PupTop Contributor: Archery

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Nice fit.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. One for my 5 year old son and one for my 7 year old daughter. Fits both okay. Does wobble around a little bit, but since the helmet has the snaps to allow a chain strap to be added I will probably just pick a couple up and it should be fine. Both kids say it's comfortable. And they have dropped them down the stairs, kicked them, and tossed them across the garage enough just in the last couple weeks to prove to me that they are of a pretty strong quality too - still no damage to either one! Would recommend. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Andréa B.

customer_reviews.title: Youth black fit 5,6 year olds perfect. Durable and very tough helmet
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the black youth helmet for my 5 year old playing T-Ball. The helmet fit perfect and was exactly what was needed for playing. Ended up ordering extra for other team members. The helmet was smashed on the ground multiple times and held up wonderful. Very pleased with the transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Jayleen SpencerTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: 61/4 fit perfect my 3 year old head size 20inches
customer_reviews.text: Bought this helmet for our son who will be starting T-ball soon and I have included a picture of a hat chart to help out because this can be difficult when deciding if it will fit your child. My sons head was about 20inches when I measured it and would mean he would fall into the 61/4 hat size and this helmet fits him perfect. Not loose and not tight. This helmet feels and looks quality definitely for the money cost me around $8.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Fits 5 year old well
customer_reviews.text: Seems to fit our 5 year old great! Just arrived today so we will see how it holds up in the game. The listing didn’t not which face guard to buy. I found that both the Rawlings BBYWG & BB1WG fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great batting helmet!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fit my son perfectly. I was a little worried about buying a batting helmet online thinking it may not fit but we didn't have any issues. I bought the face guard for it on Amazon as well and it fit just right. I added his name to the back of it and he could not be happier to rock his helmet at his upcoming practice tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Lee Anne

customer_reviews.title: Stayed put when he ran!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this used for half the price but it looked new! It fit snug on my 6-year old but still felt like there was room to grow into. A lot of our teammates had helmets that flopped around as they ran and got in the way, this one stayed put! We had a little trouble putting his glasses on when he was wearing this helmet, but nothing too difficult, he adapted.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Small size - PERFECT for a 4 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Very happy! My four-year-old has a small head. And every helmet seems to flop around on his head. This helmet is small and fits him perfectly. Also the foam on the inside is very thick and should allow him to use it for a year or two before I have to upgrade sizes. Very thankful I was able to find a helmet this small. Good quality and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet!
customer_reviews.text: My little guy was barely 4 when he started T Ball (so he was the smallest one there). This was a little bit big on him, but definitely not too big where he couldn't run with it on. Very padded and comfortable on the inside, tough and very durable on the outside. I can tell we will get a lot more use out of this!
customer_reviews.author: KristenO

customer_reviews.title: Best Helmet Ever
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for 2-4 year old and fit perfectly. It was a Christmas gift and he loved it so much he slept in it, wears it in his car seat, riding his tricycle and just about anywhere else he can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, even better price!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fits my 5 (almost 6) year old perfectly. We first tried Dicks Sporting Goods but found the “t-ball” helmets too small (Dicks price $20) and the next size up for $20 was too big. They did have a helmet that fit but those helmets were $30+. When we got home I found this on Amazon and it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Corrin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My sons head is 20" around which is equivalent to around 6 1/2". Fits perfect. I'd rather have it fit perfect than loose. Its very affordable to not worry about "he'll grow out of it" bcuz when hes on the field. Id rather have him be comfortable than always adjusting it and loose.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tball Helmet
customer_reviews.text: My son is going on his second year of playing baseball. I so wish I bought this helmet sooner! I hate when they are wearing helmets that are too big and just wobble on their head. This helmet is perfect! It has padding on the inside and fits my five year old perfectly. He loves it! It is very comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for youth baseball
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful helmet for youth baseball. At first, I was concerned that it wouldn’t fit my son’s head because he currently wears an adult-sized bike helmet. However, it has plenty of room to grow thanks to the padding inside. For reference, my son is 6 years old, 4’ tall and about 48lbs with a huge head (lol!). He loves the helmet because it’s lightweight and easy for him to manage on his own. If I needed to buy another, I would buy a different color, only so we could identify it easily at baseball practice and games but a little bit of colorful sharpie did the job.
customer_reviews.author: RJL

customer_reviews.title: Great but make sure you read for tee ball age
customer_reviews.text: Really nice helmet. My son wanted to keep it even though it was too small for him. It would be best for a kid around 5 I would guess. My 8 year old was too big for it (as I should have realized before I ordered). But super comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: If you need a face mask attached, buy this and a mask separately
customer_reviews.text: Needed a tee ball helmet with a face mask. Found this plus a mask was so much cheaper than already assembled ones. It was as easy as turning a couple of screws to attach the mask. You do need to purchase the correct mask, which a lot of these reviews recommend the specific type.
customer_reviews.author: mccbe

customer_reviews.title: Comfy perfect for 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with baseball. Got as a gift for 4th birthday fits great! It's huge on my 1.5 year old but great for him. The padding on the inside is quality. He says it's comfortable. I can put it on too, just a tad small.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay J

customer_reviews.title: My girl didn't want to take it off!
customer_reviews.text: This was our first season in Tball and our daughter loved this helmet! She put it on as soon as we got it and didn't want to take it off. It fit perfectly and when she would run or get hit with it, she said she couldn't feel a thing!
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a little girl
customer_reviews.text: I have an almost 7 year old and I was worried if this would be too small but the fit was perfect! The price is about half of what you would pay in a sports store and shipping was quick. The color is just like the picture and my daughter was happy to have a pretty pink one that was like the rest of the kids on her team and I was happy to find it at such a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: My 6-year old daughter loves this helmet and it comes with the chin strap, so don't buy an extra one like is often suggested. You do need to buy the face mask grill to attach to it, which takes about 2 minutes to do. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: DKLJNB

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet! Perfect for 4-6 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love having their own helmets and I love that they aren't sharing the t-ball team's helmets with 100 other kids. Yuck haha. These fit great and are easy to get on and off. Best value for money - less expensive on Amazon than at Walmart!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime A Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Great for t ball 5-7 year olds.
customer_reviews.text: Helmet firts 5 year old perfectly for t ball! Helmet DOES NOT come with chin strap or face guard, those were purchased separately on amazon and assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Helmet fit perfect on my 5 yo with room to grow into ...
customer_reviews.text: Helmet fit perfect on my 5 yo with room to grow into it. If I remember correctly my childs head measured 21 inches round. Does not come with face guard which I went to local shop and bought. Only been used for a couple of practices and has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Fit a 5-year-old perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Kids were sharing helmets on my niece's t-ball team, so I ordered this. It fit her 5-year-old head perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: jmonique

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Due to covid i had to buy my son a helmet for baseball season (he’s 6) i didn’t want to spend a bunch of money for a sport he is trying for the first time. I bought the red one under $20 and it fits perfect! I am so happy with it. It’s snug but not tight.
customer_reviews.author: victoria j.

customer_reviews.title: Noggin saver
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old is small, but has a pretty good sized melon, and this is just 'slightly' to big, but still wearable. It looks better than all his teammates' helmets, so that's a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Y. Trehalf

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality helmet. Walmart has the same one, for roughly the same price. But who can be free shipping to your house. Definitely a good by fits my five year olds head well.
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet- even for a large head
customer_reviews.text: My son has a large head for his age so we always have a hard time finding helmets that fit him. This fit him and his younger cousin both without a problem. They have been holding up well for t ball so far.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Even the smallest size (6 1/4) is too big for my 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: For kids with smaller heads or younger ones, I'd look elsewhere. Seems heavier compared to other manufacturers. The helmet started to tip backwards so his forehead was exposed. Rawlings need to make smaller sized.
customer_reviews.author: Shane P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old daughter a few months ago for tball. She absolutely loved having her own helmet and it did the job. It fits nicely on the outer part of a baseball backpack I purchased as well. She loved wearing it and it fit her perfectly! I purchased a chin strap from Walmart and it easily fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We went to Dicks sporting goods looking for a pink helmet and all they had for T ball size was the Adidas brand which would not fit her head at all. Very strange. My sons t ball helmet is Rawlings brand so I went ahead and ordered the Rawlings pink helmet and it fit perfect. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Color is a little off
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving 4 stars because I’m not entirely sure we were sent the right color? 😂 I added a picture from amazon and a picture of the helmet received. I thought it would be a much brighter blue 🤷‍♀️ Other than that the helmet is as expected and fits my 6 year old well.
customer_reviews.author: Mom23

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for t ball
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my four year old son for at all. It was a tiny bit loose but I didn’t see this as any issue so he can continue to grow with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Minor

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect helmet for my son! He plays 6U, Shetland, going to be 5 in a few months, 3.5 feet tall & about 48lbs. Hopefully that helps for anyone inquiring. I had no idea what size to get so referencing another child is great! Price point was amazing & shipping to Hawai’i was extremely fast. Very satisfied👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: CU

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great item for my kid. He love it, it fits perfect and looks great. Guess I’m going to buy a second one but in another color
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Too big for 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old is able to wear it but it is definitely too big. It always falls off when he runs. Probably Better for a 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 3 year old son very well, with room to grow! Since there is this soft plushy foam inside it will last him a couple years!! He adores it!!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My daughter is a small 4.5 year old and the standard t ball helmet sold in stores didn’t fit. Found this one for half the price if not more, and it fits great!!
customer_reviews.author: imrock123

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Stickers are easily removable with a little degreaser and a razor blade. Did that to put the team stickers on. Nice helmet for the money
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my son. He is 4 y.o. also all of the other kids on his team seem to like it. They dont look like bobble heads when running to the bases. Good for the price too.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie G.

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: my son's head is on the larger side, so this is a tight fit, i must say. however, the foam is sure to shrink a bit, and then i wonder whether it'll be too small. anyway, for $20, can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: BrilliantBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great t-ball helmet
customer_reviews.text: I really like the helmet. My son had no issues with it while playing t-ball. We purchased for $15 and it has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 6 year olds head! Needed for Tball and fit just right. Great quality and heavily padded
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Fits a 5 year old boy perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: This little 5 year old boy is very happy with his own baseball batting helmet. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Garfield

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits our 5 yr old perfect for t-ball. Was able to buy a guard from Wal-Mart for $10 to add to it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Klingler

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to see it go across the field!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect helmet, just waiting to be able to have a baseball season because of this Covid virus! My little girl is excited!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jones

customer_reviews.title: Rawlings. Cant go wrong with that name!
customer_reviews.text: All of my boys' team mates on little league want to use their Rawlings helmets because they are so nice and comfy. Perfect fit for 7 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Twesten

customer_reviews.title: Too big!
customer_reviews.text: It was really big to be a t-ball helment. It worked though for what we needed it for. My poor 5 year old had trouble running to the bases because the helmet was bouncing and trying to fall off her little head.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect and just so glad I didn't have to get out and go to a sports store!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Clark

customer_reviews.title: Home run with this helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Perfect for my 6 year old son. Isn’t heavy and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: TCP

customer_reviews.title: Great for your T-Baller
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this helmet. He is 5, average / athletic build. Fits him perfect and he looks good doin it
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Hard to tell if its heavy on my 5 yr olds head but she doesn't complain. Good quality and easy to pop on and off. Durable too.
customer_reviews.author: maudie

customer_reviews.title: ... fits my 4 almost 5 year old sons head perfect! Almost every kid at tball has a helmet ...
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fits my 4 almost 5 year old sons head perfect! Almost every kid at tball has a helmet that is too big, they wear their ball cap under their helmet, but this one fits great. The padding is thick but squishy so I bet it will still fit for a few years. The padding will just squish down to allow for growth. There is a very petite 3 year old girl on the team. She has the same helmet and it seems to fit her well too!
customer_reviews.author: jinnyd85

customer_reviews.title: Value and safety
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this. Bought it for both of our boys for t ball. Great price, built like all the rest. No way would I spend $50 on an under armor t ball helmet when this is available.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Orren

customer_reviews.title: Good quality helmet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old Grandson. It is well made with soft foam lining, and it fits him well. At first I thought it was too tight, but the foam lining compresses well for a snug, comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not super high end but great for the price. Fit my almost 5 year old nicely. Seems comfortable. Would definitely recommend and would repurchase. We did actually as we lost the first one.
customer_reviews.author: AprilK

customer_reviews.title: Great value and a great item!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is perfect! It can take a beating but is still comfortable for my son!
customer_reviews.author: jmtbadger

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, fit the my son’s head (7.5 years old ) perfectly and very strong.
customer_reviews.author: RDT

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves
customer_reviews.text: The helmet fits my 6 year old, my 10 year old put it on and it fit her. Nicely padded inside, thick plastic shell. Bright color. I can spot her on the field quickly.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: T ball
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my boys head safe in baseball t ball approved
customer_reviews.author: Christopher klecka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for T-ball
customer_reviews.text: My 4.5 year old son wears this for his first year in t-ball. Fits a little loose but not shaky-loose. Hoping it’ll fit next year too.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for Tball
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet for Tball. Fit our 4yo’s head just fine (with and without a baseball cap).
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 4yo
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4yo. He is the size of a 5/6yo and has room to grow into this. I did the vinyl for his helmet and love all the open space to fit his name.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 years daughter feels it very snug and comfortable. its easier to run with this helmet on which is was complaining about the others I tried before!!
customer_reviews.author: Bhoot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This fit my 3 year old perfectly. Doesn’t wiggle but isn’t tight or uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps his melon safe
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this for him when he was a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Giannoni

customer_reviews.title: Great for little kids
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 3 yr old twins pretty snug. It looks big on there heads but the inner foam keeps it snug.
customer_reviews.author: Twinzy2

customer_reviews.title: Pink perfection
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet nice thick padding and fun color. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for average 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fits my average-sized 4.5 year old son perfectly, and also works for my 90th percentile head sized 2 year old (25 months) daughter. My son tells me it is comfortable, and it stays on his head as he bats and runs the bases (even through his "slides" which he insists on doing at every base). I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G

customer_reviews.title: Great helmets
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kids playing tball. They are 6 and fit them great.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our boys who play both t-ball / coach pitch and are five and six. It fits so well and doesn’t flop around on their heads while running bases. It takes a beating too and has held up well - I realized later we could have purchased the product cheaper locally but still not unhappy with what we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit my kids head great. Could be the size of his head. Otherwise nice helmet!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Came in looking used
customer_reviews.text: This helmet came in scratched up as if it was used. I would return it if it weren't going to get scratched anyways. The sticker on the helmet even looks like it was re-applied.
customer_reviews.author: Shack2005

customer_reviews.title: Seems like really good quality and it is so comfortable she ...
customer_reviews.text: A touch big for our 4.5 year old but should fit perfectly next year. Seems like really good quality and it is so comfortable she sometimes forgets it is on and wears it in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy310

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great value so my child doesn’t need to share batting helmets at practice.
customer_reviews.author: Odjib20

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but a bit to big for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my daughter for softball. Looks like a good quality helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great for the $
customer_reviews.text: Daughter just started t-ball/coach pitch softball and this was perfect. Fits her good, is comfortable and was a great price
customer_reviews.author: Augare

customer_reviews.title: Fun but a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 3 year old grandson. Kind of heavy at this age...probably great for someone a little older
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this helmet because it’s pink. The color sold it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it. She has a ton of hair and it fir comfortable
customer_reviews.author: James D Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet, fits great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Exactly what we needed and fits my 5 year old perfectly. Love how thick the padding is, too!
customer_reviews.author: Gabe S.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted. A tad big for my 3 year old but we just layered her baseball hat underneath and we were ready for her T-ball game!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter and Sarah Wagner

customer_reviews.title: ... five year old son and seven year old daughter nicely. It also fits in our T-Ball UA bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my five year old son and seven year old daughter nicely. It also fits in our T-Ball UA bag (smaller than a regular bat bag) I was surprised!
customer_reviews.author: sspiegal

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this helmet for my 5 year old son for tball. Fits well and seems safe.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Fraction of the price of UA and others with the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: zackley616

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my 5 year old.. Bought the face guard and strap seperate..
customer_reviews.author: neil brockett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for t-ballers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is playing Tball for the first time and I'm thrilled! Fits great and has great padding to protect his clumsy self. Highly recommended a name brand for helmets
customer_reviews.author: AM Gold

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great helmet for my 7yr old. Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: indygal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4 and this Fit his big head perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and nice price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 7 year old grandson. Same helmet at sports store for less than half the price.
customer_reviews.author: SJC California

customer_reviews.title: Batterup
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter getting ready for tball. She is just 2, but has a large head, she will grow into real quick. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Miller

customer_reviews.title: Tball helmet
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 5 year old and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Padding thick! And can’t remove
customer_reviews.text: It would be a good helmet but the size it says you can’t go by that! My son wears this size but the padding was soooo thick that he can’t even put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Professional buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for coach pitch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters little league coach pitch season. It was adorable and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Rawlings Coolflo Youth Tball Batting Helmet
product_meta.description: Rawlings Coolflo T-Ball Batting HelmetFirst and foremost, the Rawlings Coolflo T-Ball Batting Helmet offers protection and safety you demand when your rookie slugger goes to bat and runs around the bases. They will enjoy the style and the state-of-the-art Coolflo venting system with its sleek, aerodynamic look to keep them cool and comfortable. Its the perfect youth batting helmet, offering the fit, comfort and style so they will enjoy the first of many seasons on the diamond.Features: * Meets NOCSAEA standards * CoolfloA venting system offers breathability and cooling comfort * EVA dual density foam adds comfort and protection from impacts * Pre-drilled for Rawlings NOCSAEA approved face guards * Aerodynamic look with molded finish * Removable front logo * Fits hat sizes 6 1/4 -A 6 7/8
feature_bullets: Ideal for TBALL Players: This batting helmet features the traditional CoolFlo Design and is crafted with the batter's protection as the number 1 priority
Protection and comfortable fit due to dual density foam
Pre drilled for rawlings NOCSAE approved face guards
Abs plastic shell with clear coat, molded finish
